video_prompt: **Floating pagodas subtly sway, connected by arching bridges. Ethereal blue light streaks fall like rain, as glowing floral formations bloom and fade. Misty purple foliage gently expands below, hinting at soft movements.**
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A fantastical East Asian-inspired floating city, ethereal and dreamlike. Multi-tiered pagodas and ornate buildings with dark roofs and golden accents are built on luminous, blue-lit platforms suspended above clouds of light purple foliage. Arched stone bridges connect structures. Abundant glowing blue crystal flora, streams of descending blue and white light, and light waterfalls add to the magical atmosphere. The scene is framed by dark, rocky cave formations with golden lanterns, under a soft blue-grey sky. Cool color palette with glowing blues, purples, and golden accents.
refined_video_prompt: Pagodas subtly sway, their arching bridges gently undulate. Ethereal blue light streaks continuously fall, as glowing floral formations rapidly bloom and softly fade. Misty purple foliage gently expands and ripples below.
